location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 31 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a translation of a firmaun [firman] from Hossain Ali Meerza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā], Prince at Sheraz [Shiraz], which asks the Resident to arrange for passage to India for Shaikh Ibrahim [Ibrāhīm]. The letter notes that the Resident has instructed the Linguist at Bushire to assist with this request.
